original_text: And it was about the space of three hours after, when his wife, not knowing what was done, came in.
korean_text: 세 시간쯤 지나 그의 아내가 그 일어난 일을 알지 못하고 들어오니

sentences.original_text: And it was about the space of three hours after
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 후 약 세 시간쯤 되었을 때

sentences.original_text: when his wife, not knowing what was done, came in
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내가 무슨 일이 일어났는지 모른 채 들어왔을 때

sentences.original_text: his wife not knowing what was done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아내가 무슨 일이 일어났는지 알지 못하고
